source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: How to become a badass manager and CEO

visible_instructors.name: Asen
visible_instructors.title: Asen Gyczew
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in performance improvement, turnaround and startups

items.headline: Practical guide how to successfully transition to a manager position and later on to a CEO position
objectives_summary: Define what to do and what not to do as a manager or a CEO
Manage efficiently your team
Find ways to improve and grow the business

items.title: Organizational Change
items.headline: University course as being teached at Swedish universities that will introduce you to the Organizational Change.
objectives_summary: Understand and execute the basics of organizational change.
Improve the learning of any organization.
Acknowledge the basic biases in organizational decision making.

items.title: Business Continuity Management & ISO 22301 - Complete Guide
items.headline: Learn Business Continuity Management from Organizational Resilience, Risk Management & Business Management perspectives!
objectives_summary: Understand what Business Continuity Management is and what it's not
Understand why effective Business Continuity Management is Key to Success of Any Business
Learn and differentiate between related organizational resilience concepts - including Emergency Response, Crisis Management, Incident Management and IT Disaster Recovery

items.title: A/B Testing Crash Course for Product Managers
items.headline: Learn a step by step process to figure out what to A/B test from a Senior Director of Product Management.
objectives_summary: Learn a step-by-step process to identify the right things to test.
Supercharge your experiments with advanced frameworks and analyses techniques.
Understand how successful organizations approach to A/B testing.

items.title: Cybersecurity Law & Policy
items.headline: Domestic and International Cybersecurity Law
objectives_summary: Spot legal issues in cybersecurity situations
Analyze the pros and cons of bitcoin, the digital currency
Be aware of social media implications for litigation

items.title: First Time Manager Course

visible_instructors.name: Shashank
visible_instructors.title: Shashank Jani
visible_instructors.job_title: Business Leader, Coach and Trainer for 25+ years

items.headline: Learn the skills needed to become a great manager, even if it's your first time.
objectives_summary: Motivating People
Setting Goals for self and others
Giving Positive workplace feedback

items.title: SaaS Metrics Fundamentals for Managers, Founders & Investors

visible_instructors.name: Jimmy
visible_instructors.title: Jimmy Chim
visible_instructors.job_title: SaaS, Cloud and Software - Finance and Strategy Expert

items.headline: The Most Comprehensive Course on SaaS Metrics: Bookings, ARR, Churn, Retention, LTV, CAC, Unit Economics and Dashboard
objectives_summary: Measure and Track the Right SaaS Metrics **FREE DASHBOARD TEMPLATE INCLUDED**
Articulate the SaaS Business Model
Analyze SaaS Business Trends

items.title: Leading Disciplinary Meetings and Investigations
items.headline: A guide to informal resolution, investigations and formal disciplinary hearings
objectives_summary: use informal resolution to address a disciplinary problem in the workplace
take a constructive approach to tackling minor disciplinary issues
identify when it might be necessary to go down the formal disciplinary route and what this will entail

items.title: Food Safety for Managers and Supervisors
items.headline: The Highfield Food Safety Level 3 syllabus presented in two hours of video tutorials. Boost your food safety knowledge.
objectives_summary: Learn all of the Highfield Level Three food safety syllabus, with a focus on HACCP.

items.title: How to Write a Business Plan

visible_instructors.name: Skillay
visible_instructors.title: Skillay Academy
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneurship, business and digital marketing training.

items.headline: Business Blueprint Series: Write a Business Plan in a Week, Online Resources, Templates, Samples, Guides, Startups
objectives_summary: Understand what is a Business Plan
Know what is the purpose of a Business Plan
Learn why you need to write one for your business

items.title: Operation Management, Supply Chain Management and 6 Sigma .
items.headline: Fundamentals Of Operation Management , Supply Chain Management & Logistics.Basics of six sigma and their roles and tool
objectives_summary: Operation management fundamental
Implementation and effectiveness of operation Management
Supply chain versus operation Management

items.title: The Superstar Manager Course
items.headline: Learn to create and implement a continuous-improvement management system and SHINE in your role of Supervisor or Manager
objectives_summary: Manage your area better than you ever imagined doing before!
Create a continuous-improvement management control system
Capitalize on the best practices you will soon be able to identify

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt for Service Industry Professionals

visible_instructors.name: Koundinya
visible_instructors.title: Koundinya Nemana (Edushore)
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert trainer for Lean | Lean Six Sigma | Creative Thinking

items.headline: Green Belt course exclusively designed for professionals who work in service industries (any non-manufacturing industry)
objectives_summary: Simplified explanations of all the concepts of Lean Six Sigma Green Belt with practical examples and exercises designed exclusively for service industry scenarios.
Multiple exercises (with key) for each module with detailed (step by step) instructions. All you need is MS Excel for these exercises and you can download these exercise files.
A real case study of how a Lean Six Sigma Green Belt project is driven to improve a service industry process.

items.title: Product Management Crash Course; IT Product Management

visible_instructors.name: Mauricio
visible_instructors.title: Mauricio Rubio - Agile Guru & Founder of AgileKB | AgileLee & Ureducation
visible_instructors.display_name: Mauricio Rubio - Agile Guru & Founder of AgileKB | AgileLee & Ureducation
visible_instructors.job_title: Serial entrepreneur, techie, life hacker, expert PM & MBA

items.headline: Product Management Essentials & Product Management Fundamentals to kick-start your career in Product Management
objectives_summary: Product Management Essentials & Fundamentals
What you need to know to become a Product Manager
Product Management Skills

items.title: Diploma Course in Leadership & Business Management : DLBM

visible_instructors.name: Abhisek
visible_instructors.title: Abhisek Gupta
visible_instructors.job_title: HR Leader, Author, Leadership & Management Coach, PM and OD

items.headline: Course Curriculum designed similar to top B Schools diploma course & MDP of Top MNC' s : Project, CaseStudy & Roleplays
objectives_summary: You will learn the key factors in Leadership, Management and Business with explanatory role-play videos, real time case studies with analysis, book reviews, multiple self assessments and assignments.

Learn the interpersonal communication, team building, conflict management, counseling, situational awareness, emotional intelligence and change management skill with applicable case studies and assessments.
Learn about the essential Skills required for business management like Operations, Meeting, Performance, Project and Innovation with case studies, quizzes, assignments and Course works.

items.title: ISO 22000. Food Safety Management System.
items.headline: Learn about hazard identification and assessment, PRPs, Critical Control Points, and the requirements in ISO 22000:2018.
objectives_summary: What is food safety
How to develop and manage a food safety system
What are the requirements of ISO 22000:2018
